body:
Hi
I joined this server like April 2014
I live in Singapore and I'm turning 15 this year.
I like forum spamming, and I can see people like Blueish like it too.
Recently, I have been lagging a lot. Idk what's wrong with my internet. Sorry to all people who I lag to death.
I'm bored, and AMAs for me never thrive. So why not just keep making them.
Ask
body_tagged:

I joined this server like April 2014

I'm bored, and AMAs for me never thrive. So why not just keep making them.
Ask

Favourite food ?

replies.body_tagged:
Favourite food ? 
What's it like to live in singapore ?

replies.body:
Pizza and Spaghetti and many others I can't think of.

Lots of homework, maybe it seems a lot to me due to my poor time management. It's the rainy season right now, so rain everyday. Safe 24/7(questionable due to recent events). "Good" Education system, I'll leave you to decide whether it's good or not. Warm weather throughout the year. Train breakdowns/train delays (6min +- waiting time). Probably lots more to say but I don't know.

I know I always I say when I feel like it, but what I really mean is when I gain more confidence in myself.

replies.body:
I got Minecraft after my Prelims, so I was 12 then.
I played some pirated version of Minecraft which was like 1.4.4
My favourite mob was the blaze and is actually still is.
I wanted something weird and extraordinary, that's where Frozen came from.
And Da was just a fancy word I wanted to use instead of The, though now that I think of it, the sounds and looks better.
I posted that in the other thread.

You seemed to be obsessed with rods, which sometimes annoys me. You keep claiming you're like god at PvP, which also annoys me. Other than that I don't know you well.
